summary: Harry and his pals are back for more adventures when they face off against dark wizards, demented monsters, and the most horrible woman in the world, Dolores Umbridge! So strap on your diapers because it's time to go back to Hogwarts.
cast: Darren Criss|Joey Richter|Bonnie Gruesen|Lauren Lopez|Joe Walker|Joe Moses|Brian Holden|Dylan Saunders|Tyler Brunsman|Jim Povolo|Jaime Lyn Beatty|Nicholas Joseph Strauss-Matathia|Corey Dorris|Devin Lytle|Arielle Goldman|Brian Rosenthal|Britney Coleman|Lily Marks|Richard Campbell|Sango Tajima|Julia Albain|Nick Lang
title: A Very Potter Sequel
